function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increase in domestic waste due to online food ordering and use of single-use packaging","Impact":"Environmental pollution and health hazards due to inadequate waste management","Mitigation":"Promote recycling, incentivize the use of biodegradable packaging, and improve waste management infrastructure","Technologies":"Biodegradable packaging, waste sorting and recycling technologies","People":"General public, waste management workers","Owner":"Government, local authorities, waste management companies"},{"Description":"Impact of air pollution on global mortality","Impact":"Contributes to almost 8% of total deaths in the world, with the most affected countries being those found in Africa, Asia, and part of Europe","Mitigation":"Implement strict pollution control measures, promote renewable energy sources, and invest in clean air technologies","Technologies":"Air quality monitoring systems, renewable energy technologies, emission control systems","People":"Global population, particularly in regions with poor air quality","Owner":"Government, environmental agencies, energy companies"},{"Description":"Decreased concentrations of NO2 and PM2.5 due to quarantine measures","Impact":"Positive impact on air quality and public health","Mitigation":"Promote sustainable transportation, continue quarantine measures, and invest in green infrastructure","Technologies":"Electric vehicles, public transportation systems, green urban planning","People":"Population in areas with improved air quality, public health officials","Owner":"Government, urban planning authorities"}]}
